channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Standing water on the road kerbside not dispersing into drains, 13th December
item.description:
The water is coming from the Jet petrol station chipperfield road BR5 2QR it has recently had the forecourt refurbished and two Jet washers have been resited. The fall of the forecourt is incorrect and when the jet washers are in use the excess waste water misses the forecourt gutter and flows onto the pavement and Chipperfield road. The water sits and stagnates and begins to smell. if the water sitting on the pavements would freeze it would be a hazard. I have informed the garage and no action has been taken. I noticed a previous complaint was raised and closed ffor this , siting a blocked sewage drain , i do not believe this to be the case,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TERN BOYZ graffiti tags all along Riverside, 13th December
item.description:
New graffiti has appeared from Royal Arsenal (edge of development) to O2 Arena - some very offensive written with the same silver paint of TERN BOYS tag alongside!!!!! I do not want to write what it says but it is highly offensive towards a female.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich High Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo in front of 1 Glebe Road, 13th December
item.description:
Dog poo outside 1 Glebe Road is almost a daily occurrence at this point. It is directly in front of our flats. The one in the photo is from this morning, but there is another one next to it which has been lying there for a week. This happens every week

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Large pothole in Road, 13th December
item.description:

item.title: Yet again - flytipping, 13th December
item.description:
